What inspires you day to day? What kind of perceptions open you up to having new ideas?
The playfulness of textures, shapes and colors in our collections stimulate your creative self.
Our patterns, initially designed for bags and various other accessories are now available to use as wallpapers!
All pattern designs showcased in the app as well as the physical products are made with love in Cluj, Romania.
This mobile application was created by Pandula Péter
Rate the app on Google Play
